column4: on my eeepc 1000h netbeans run very fast in winxp -- but on my ubuntu 8.10, it runs amazingly slow -- anything i can do about this (2gb ram)
i run openbox on my eee 900, smoooth (xcept for firefox, it blows)
i use a highly configurable gui conky, shows all kinda system info
conky also by default shows top 5 mem swallowers, but both gnome and kde have made system manager programs listing it all if ur more into guis
